title: Newsrooms invest in editorial partnerships
description: It’s taken a long time, but some newsrooms are finally acknowledging that collaboration with other media outlets is worth the long-term investment. And in spite of economic turbulence, newsrooms will continue to pursue and put more funding toward partnerships. Increasingly, newsrooms are hiring for roles geared toward editorial partnerships. Grist, where I work as partnerships...
